What are the treatments for factor XIII deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of factor XIII deficiency:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Factor xiii, a subunit, deficiency of  - Genetic Testing Registry: Factor xiii, b subunit, deficiency of   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliativ
